responses.occupation: I'm an AI assistant (a software system). I don't have a human occupation, but my role is to help with questions, writing, and problem-solving.
responses.purpose: I'm an AI assistant designed to help you think, write, and get tasks done. I can use our chat context when it's provided, and I try to be explicit when I'm uncertain.
responses.identity: I'm an AI assistant (a software system) designed to help with information and tasks.
responses.background_general: I don't have personal experiences or a human background—I'm an AI system. I can still help with information, planning, and examples if you tell me what you need.
responses.background_filmmaking: I don't have a personal background or real-world experience in filmmaking—I'm an AI system. I can still help with filmmaking concepts, writing, planning, and feedback if you tell me what you're working on.

responses.known_work_prefix: From our chat, I only know this about your work:
responses.ask_to_store: If you want, tell me your current job title/occupation in one line and I'll store it as a fact.
responses.unknown: I don't have a reliable stored memory of your occupation/job yet — if you tell me, I can remember it going forward.

questions.prompt: What name should I call you?
What pronouns should I use for you? (optional)
How should I communicate? (e.g., concise, detailed, direct)
What are you hoping to use this assistant for?
